name: NewsReader
0:
”Alexa launch News Reader”
”Alexa ask news reader, to get headlines from BBC Asia”
”Alexa ask news reader, to get news from BBC Asia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news reader
des:
Get RSS news feed from major news outlets like Reuters, BBC. You can ask of new from news outlets by section. Like if you want to get news from Reuters Politics section, you can say
Alexa ask NewReader for headlines from Reuters Politics or 
Alexa ask NewReader to get news from BBC Asia
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
